--- In gladiator@y..., "dancing corpse" <dancing_corpse@h...> wrote:
> maybe an elf in the forest can't attack?

I would rather have something along the lines of high experience level 
elves develop an abrasion for staying in the forest too long and would 
 want to leave the forest if they stayed too long, but that wouldn't 
be fair either.  The other possibility is rocks lose their 
effectiveness as they travel through the forest.

It is not an issue for most people, unless we start creating lots of 
scenarios with elves that are that high experience levels.

Like I have said before, you really don't know a character until you 
play with the character at a really experience level. There is a lot 
to talk about if I get to "game issues".

Thankfully, elves already have the impulsiveness of heading towards 
their oppponent.
